column2: the  case  of  Muhandiram  Vs.  Chairman,  No.  111,  Janatha  Estate

column1: Development Board (1992) 1 SLR 110, it was held;

column2: “In an inquiry under the State Lands (Recovery of Possession) Act, the onus
is on the person summoned to establish his possession or occupation that it
is possessed or occupied upon a valid permit or other written authority of

column1: the  State  granted  according  to  any  written

column2: discharged, the only option opened to the Magistrate is to order ejectment.”
